title: Mobile App UI Design for Finance Tracker
description:
Seeking a creative UI designer to develop a clean, intuitive mobile app interface for a personal finance tracking app. Your design should focus on simplicity, usability, and engagement to help users easily track income, expenses, and budgets.

Experience with mobile-first design, interactive prototypes, and tools like Figma or Adobe XD required.

Budget and deadline are tight â€” only apply if you can deliver high-quality work quickly.
requiredSkills: Understanding of finance app UX principles
Attention to usability and clean visuals
Quick turnaround and adaptability to feedback
extraNotes:
* Portfolio must include mobile UI work.
* Source files and prototypes required.
* Regular updates and responsiveness expected.

title: Redesign Corporate Website UI/UX
description:
Looking for an experienced UI/UX designer to redesign our corporate website to enhance professionalism and user engagement. You will create wireframes, mood boards, and high-fidelity prototypes, focusing on clarity, branding consistency, and conversion.

Must be familiar with corporate design standards, responsive layouts, and modern UI tools.
requiredSkills: Knowledge of branding and visual hierarchy
Proficiency in Adobe XD or Figma
extraNotes:
* Portfolio showcasing corporate website redesigns required.
* Source files and prototypes deliverables.
* Timely communication and iteration expected.

title: Create Landing Page UI Design for Finance Startup
description:
Need a skilled UI designer to create a high-converting landing page for a finance startup. The landing page must be visually appealing, clear in messaging, and optimized for lead capture.

Experience with conversion-focused UI design and tools like Figma or Adobe XD is essential.

Deadline is strict; only experienced designers should apply.
requiredSkills: Proficiency with Figma or Adobe XD
extraNotes:
* Portfolio with landing pages required.
* Source files and prototypes expected.
* Timely updates and iterations are necessary.

title: UX Audit and UI Improvement for Finance Dashboard
description:
We need a UX/UI expert to audit our existing finance dashboard and suggest improvements to usability, flow, and visual design. Deliverables include a detailed audit report plus redesign mockups.

Experience with data-heavy interfaces and finance products preferred.
extraNotes:
* Portfolio with audit or redesign projects preferred.
* Deliverables: audit report, wireframes, mockups.
* Punctual and clear communication required.

title: Create Interactive Prototype for Finance Mobile App
description:
Looking for a UI/UX designer to build a fully interactive prototype of a new finance mobile app. You will translate wireframes into clickable, user-friendly prototypes for usability testing and stakeholder presentations.

Experience with Figma or Adobe XD is mandatory.

Fast turnaround is required.
requiredSkills: Prototyping with Figma or Adobe XD
Ability to create smooth interactive flows
extraNotes:
* Please share relevant prototype samples.
* Deliverables include the interactive prototype file.
* Timely updates expected.

title: Design UI Kit for Finance Web Application
description:
Need a UI designer to create a comprehensive UI kit for a finance web application. This includes buttons, forms, typography, color schemes, and reusable components to maintain design consistency.

Experience in Figma or Sketch required.
requiredSkills: UI kit and design system creation
Experience with design tools like Figma or Sketch
extraNotes:
* Portfolio with UI kit samples preferred.
* Source files mandatory.
* Communication and deadline adherence required.

title: UX Research and Wireframing for Investment Platform
description:
We require a UX researcher and wireframe expert to analyze user flows and create detailed wireframes for a new investment platform. Your insights will help shape the platformâ€™s user experience.

Strong research skills and wireframing ability are a must.
extraNotes:
* Examples of past UX research and wireframe projects preferred.
* Deliverables include wireframes and research report.

title: Design Responsive Dashboard UI for Finance Analytics
description:
Looking for a UI designer to create a responsive dashboard UI for a finance analytics platform. The dashboard should present complex data clearly and intuitively for non-technical users.

Experience with data visualization UI is highly preferred.
extraNotes:
* Portfolio with dashboard designs required.
* Deliverables: design files, prototypes.
* Clear, timely communication essential.

title: Prototype and UI Design for Crypto Wallet App
description:
We want a creative UI designer to prototype and design the interface for a new cryptocurrency wallet app. Your work will focus on secure, user-friendly design suitable for both beginners and advanced users.

Experience with fintech or crypto apps is a big plus.
extraNotes:
* Crypto or fintech portfolio preferred.
* Deliverables: prototypes and source files.
* Deadline adherence and communication required.

title: UX/UI Designer for Banking Website Redesign
description:
Seeking a UX/UI designer to revamp a traditional banking website to improve usability, modernize the look, and increase customer engagement. Your role will include user research, wireframing, and UI design.

Familiarity with banking compliance and security considerations is a plus.
requiredSkills: UI design for banking or finance
extraNotes:
* Portfolio with finance or banking projects required.
* Deliverables include research, wireframes, and UI files.
* Clear communication and deadline respect are mandatory.
